content: Hello! I’m here to help you with your antenatal visit registration. Can I please have your full name, including both your first name and last name?
Thank you, Gita Prasad. Could you please tell me your full address, including the specific place where you live?
Flat 302, Sri Venkateshwara Nilaya, near Hanuman Temple, Indiranagar.

Thanks for sharing that. Could you please confirm if this is the complete address, including any street name, area, or city details? This helps ensure we have the correct information for your records.
Thank you for confirming your address. Could you please provide your 10-digit telephone number?
Nine eight triple three four seven two nine zero.
